body_html: When you specify only these options, compiler will not use other instructions available on your processor, in particular it will not use AVX512 instructions which require additional support from TF and/or Eigen library. Also, avx512 support can be broken on older compilers and this is likely the case for ubuntu 16.04 and its eldery 5.4.0 gcc

Also, avx512 support can be broken on older compilers and this is likely the case for ubuntu 16.04 and its eldery 5.4.0 gcc
body: When you specify only these options, compiler will not use other instructions available on your processor, in particular it will not use AVX512 instructions which require additional support from TF and/or Eigen library. Also, avx512 support can be broken on older compilers and this is likely the case for ubuntu 16.04 and its eldery 5.4.0 gcc
